title: How to Make Your Own Glass Cleaner

steps.headline: Mix one cup of vinegar and 1/2 tsp dish soap with one gallon warm water.
Pour in a spray bottle and use as you would with any glass cleaner.
Soak citrus peels of your choice in vinegar, a few weeks prior to making the cleaner.
Strain the citrus mixture and pour in a bottle.
Mix one cup of citrus scented vinegar with one cup of water in a spray bottle.
Mix one cup vinegar, and 1/8 cup corn starch to one gallon of water.
